results.abstract: The director of the provocative horror film “Possessor Uncut” argues that none of us are ever truly ourselves: “There’s an internal performance that we all engage with.”

results.title: Margaret Nolan, ‘Goldfinger’ Actress, Dies at 76
results.abstract: She drew fame at age 20 when she was seen painted gold in the Bond film’s opening credits. She also appeared in “A Hard Day’s Night,” with the Beatles.
